thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 29 of 7211
thread.title: Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text: B&H has a clear website to navigate. Could be better if the small accessories like screws, lens plates, and clamps had actual dimensions listed. I had to order 2 different 1/4-20 D-ring screws as they were only listed as "short" and "long." If the actual length were posted, I could have saved the need to return one. I just ordered an Arca-type quick release plate, but am not sure if it will fit in my clamp. There is no actual industry standard for Arca Swiss fittings so dimensions vary among manufacturers.
